Derelys Perdue https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Derelys_Perdue 0 Derelys Perdue (born Geraldine Perdue; March 22, 1902 – September 30, 1989) was an American silent-film actress and popular dancer during the 1920s. Derelys_Perdue ( born Geraldine_Perdue ; March_22_,_1902 – September_30_,_1989 ) was an_American_silent-film_actress and popular_dancer during the_1920s .
